name: The First Loop
description:
___________________________________________________

Controls:

Z  -  Interact

X  -  Cancel

F4  -  Toggle fullscreen

Arrow keys  -  Movement

___________________________________________________

Install instructions:

After you've downloaded the zip file, unzip it and the .exe should be towards the bottom of the main folder. 

___________________________________________________

I hope you enjoy this first little venture into my shenanigans! 

If you want to see updates of my future projects (or you encounter any bugs), you can find me on twitter @Spooky_Ryan
